page.title: 11SCHOOLBOY'S STORY (CONT.)
page.content: We come back into school at 10.45 and do English work until lunchtime at 12.00. The people who have hot meals go in first, so while they are eating, the children who eat sandwiches have some playtime. By 12.25 the dinner children have gone outside to have their playtime until 1.05p.m. when we all come in. Some of us get our swimming kit and go swimming in Leominster while the rest of us have activities. When the swimming people come back at 2.45 our class teacher reads us a story for 15 minutes. At 3.00 we pack up and go home. Some people walk, some go on the bus but most go by car like me.When I get home I watch television while I eat supper till 6.00 Then I get in the car and go to Cubs. After Cubs I go to bed, ready for the next day.
